1.16.5.1.0.0: Initial release of Ornamental: Unusually Decorative, or Undeco for short.
1.16.5.1.1.0:
• Added Walls for materials supported in Unusually Decorative.
 • Fixed model errors with various Beams under certain conditions.
 • Fixed recipe conflicts caused by incorrect ingredients.
 • Fixed a typo for Smooth Red Sandstone Trapdoor.
 • Dependency for Ornamental has been updated. Version 4.5 is required, and supported Minecraft version is now only 1.16.5.

1.18.2.1.2.0:
Ported to 1.18.2. Requires Ornamental 4.8.
 • Added Saddle Doors for materials supported in Unusually Decorative.
 • Versions on the jar file now list the Minecraft version.
1.18.2.1.2.1: Updated compatible version to Ornamental 4.8.1. Fixes a crash when placing Stair ornaments.

1.19.1.3.0:
Ported to 1.19 and above. Requires Ornamental 4.9.8.
 • Fixed Prismarine recipes using a block where it should be using a Prismarine Shard, erasing conflicts.
1.19.1.3.2:
Requires Ornamental 4.9.13.
 • Added ornaments for Mangrove Planks and Mangrove Logs.
 • Fixed recipe conflicts causing Trapdoors to become unobtainable.
 • Fixed certain Pole recipes accepting the wrong input.
